00026 #ifndef SPOT_LTLAST_CONSTANT_HH
00027 # define SPOT_LTLAST_CONSTANT_HH
00028 
00029 #include "formula.hh"
00030 
00031 namespace spot
00032 {
00033   namespace ltl
00034   {
00035 
00038     class constant : public formula
00039     {
00040     public:
00041       enum type { False, True };
00042       virtual void accept(visitor& v);
00043       virtual void accept(const_visitor& v) const;
00044 
00046       type val() const;
00048       const char* val_name() const;
00049 
00050       virtual std::string dump() const;
00051 
00053       static constant* true_instance();
00055       static constant* false_instance();
00056 
00057     protected:
00058       constant(type val);
00059       virtual ~constant();
00060 
00061     private:
00062       type val_;
00063     };
00064 
00065   }
